mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT /*selectStockResearchDataList*/ A.RP_ID, A.ORIGIN_UID, A.RP_TITLE, A.RP_DATE, A.RP_LINK, A.REL_STOCK_CODE, B.STOCKS_NAME, A.THEME_NAME, A.STOCK_RECOMMENDATION, A.DAY_PRICE, A.TARGET_PRICE, A.USER_SUMMARY, A.REG_DATE FROM STOCK_RESEARCH_DATA A, STOCKS_LIST B WHERE A.REL_STOCK_CODE = B.STOCKS_CODE(+) ORDER BY A.RP_DATE DESC ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(A.RP_ID) AS CNT FROM STOCK_RESEARCH_DATA A, STOCKS_LIST B WHERE A.REL_STOCK_CODE = B.STOCKS_CODE(+)
mapper.insert: /* 중복 데이터 방지를 위한 MERGE 구문 사용 (제목과 작성일 기준) */ MERGE INTO STOCK_RESEARCH_DATA T USING DUAL ON ( T.RP_TITLE = #{rpTitle} AND T.RP_DATE = #{rpDate} AND T.ORIGIN_UID = #{originUid} AND T.REL_STOCK_CODE = #{relStockCode} ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( RP_ID, ORIGIN_UID, RP_TITLE, RP_DATE, RP_LINK, REL_STOCK_CODE, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_STOCK_RESEARCH_ID.NEXTVAL, #{originUid}, #{rpTitle}, #{rpDate}, #{rpLink}, #{relStockCode}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT /*selectMyStockDetail*/ A.RP_ID, A.ORIGIN_UID, A.RP_TITLE, A.RP_DATE, A.RP_LINK, A.REL_STOCK_CODE, B.STOCKS_NAME, A.THEME_NAME, A.STOCK_RECOMMENDATION, A.DAY_PRICE, A.TARGET_PRICE, A.USER_SUMMARY, A.REG_DATE FROM STOCK_RESEARCH_DATA A, STOCKS_LIST B WHERE A.REL_STOCK_CODE = B.STOCKS_CODE(+) AND A.RP_ID = #{seq}
